short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and easy way to see how ethical a clothing company is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Green Tag helps online shoppers quickly identify ethical clothing brands. We are dedicated to making it easy to online shop both ethically and sustainably by providing a simple and easy to read rating based on a clothing company's impact on people, planet, and policies. We want you to be able to make informed decisions easily, which is why we do all the research so you don't have to!
